item.title: Words and sentences given by |han≠kass'o at the South African Museum
item.summary: Names of Animals, mainly identified at the South African Museum. Given by /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-2. 6141-6145, 9. 6770-6775, 21. 7817, 7819-7821, 7842 and 7843, 7843, 7846, 31. 8790 rev. and 8791).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-2
